title: Client crashed every 2 games during champ select + chat bug in the end game screen
body:
For the past couple of days, i have been having a strange bug. Every 2 games (literally) my client crashes ( in the champ select of the 2nd game)  whenever i try to change my rune/masteries and i either get a bugsplat or a "failed to create dump file". After i log back in, i can't do anything until the game has started. It's getting really frustrating since i start the game with a huge disadvantage. 

Also, there is a bug with the chat in the end game screen. Here is a pic showing it: https://gyazo.com/9c2c06fd45dd9e376842fab5f694dd93  
It doesn't happens every time but it's still a pain.

replies.body: Damn, sorry that's happening to you.  Based on all this information, it sounds like you might have some bad game files that's failing to render and properly load settings and assets.  My suggestion here would be to download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and perform a repair to get that fixed up.  It's really important to test this in custom games afterwards, though, to prevent any penalties!  I hope that helps!
